title: KHR_materials_fuzz glTF Material Extension
description: glTF extension that defines the fuzz material model.

fuzzFactor.description: The intensity of the fuzz layer.
fuzzFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The intensity (opacity) of the fuzz layer. A value of 0.0 means the material has no fuzz layer enabled.

fuzzTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The fuzz intensity texture. These values are sampled from the R channel. The values are linear. Use value 1.0 if no texture is supplied.

fuzzColorFactor.description: Color of the fuzz layer (in linear space).
fuzzColorFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The fuzz color in linear space. These values are multiplied by the fuzzFactor and fuzzTexture to determine the final fuzz color.

fuzzColorTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The fuzz color (RGB) texture. Stored in channel RGB, the fuzz color is in sRGB transfer function.

fuzzRoughnessFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The fuzz layer roughness of the material.

fuzzRoughnessTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The fuzz roughness texture. Stored in alpha channel, the roughness value is in linear space.
